trnbl.loggers.tensorboard

View on GitHub 

  1import datetime
  2from typing import Any
  3from pathlib import Path
  4import json
  5import hashlib
  6
  7from torch.utils.tensorboard import SummaryWriter
  8
  9from trnbl.loggers.base import TrainingLoggerBase, rand_syllabic_string
 10
 11
 12class TensorBoardLogger(TrainingLoggerBase):
 13	def __init__(
 14		self,
 15		log_dir: str | Path,
 16		train_config: dict | None = None,
 17		name: str | None = None,
 18		**kwargs,
 19	) -> None:
 20		train_config_json: str = json.dumps(train_config, indent="\t")
 21
 22		if name is None:
 23			_run_hash: str = hashlib.md5(train_config_json.encode()).hexdigest()
 24			name = f"h{_run_hash[:5]}-{datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%y%m%d_%H%M')}-{rand_syllabic_string()}"
 25
 26		log_dir = (Path(log_dir) / name).as_posix()
 27
 28		# Initialize the TensorBoard SummaryWriter with the specified log directory
 29		self._writer: SummaryWriter = SummaryWriter(log_dir=log_dir, **kwargs)
 30
 31		# Store the run path
 32		self._run_path: Path = Path(log_dir)
 33
 34		# Initialize the global step counter
 35		self._global_step: int = 0
 36
 37		# Log the training configuration
 38		self._self_writer_add_text("config", train_config_json)
 39		self._self_writer_add_text("name", name)
 40		with open(self._run_path / "config.json", "w") as f:
 41			f.write(train_config_json)
 42
 43	def _self_writer_add_text(self, tag: str, message: str, **kwargs) -> None:
 44		self._writer.add_text(
 45			tag,
 46			message + ("" if not kwargs else "\n" + json.dumps(kwargs, indent=4)),
 47			global_step=self._global_step,
 48		)
 49
 50	def debug(self, message: str, **kwargs) -> None:
 51		self._self_writer_add_text("debug", message, **kwargs)
 52
 53	def message(self, message: str, **kwargs) -> None:
 54		self._self_writer_add_text("message", message, **kwargs)
 55
 56		# Also print the message
 57		print(message)
 58
 59	def metrics(self, data: dict[str, Any]) -> None:
 60		# Log a dictionary of metrics using add_scalar in TensorBoard
 61		for key, value in data.items():
 62			self._writer.add_scalar(key, value, global_step=self._global_step)
 63
 64		# Increment the global step counter
 65		self._global_step += 1
 66
 67	def artifact(
 68		self,
 69		path: Path,
 70		type: str,
 71		aliases: list[str] | None = None,
 72		metadata: dict | None = None,
 73	) -> None:
 74		# Log an artifact file using add_artifact in TensorBoard
 75		self._writer.add_text(
 76			tag="artifact",
 77			text_string=json.dumps(
 78				dict(
 79					timestamp=datetime.datetime.now().isoformat(),
 80					path=path.as_posix(),
 81					type=type,
 82					aliases=aliases,
 83					metadata=metadata if metadata else {},
 84				)
 85			),
 86			global_step=self._global_step,
 87		)
 88
 89	@property
 90	def url(self) -> str:
 91		# Return the command to launch TensorBoard with the specified log directory
 92		return f"tensorboard --logdir={self._run_path}"
 93
 94	@property
 95	def run_path(self) -> Path:
 96		# Return the run path
 97		return self._run_path
 98
 99	def flush(self) -> None:
100		self._writer.flush()
101
102	def finish(self) -> None:
103		# Flush and close the TensorBoard SummaryWriter
104		self._writer.flush()
105		self._writer.close()

class TensorBoardLogger(trnbl.loggers.base.TrainingLoggerBase):

 13class TensorBoardLogger(TrainingLoggerBase):
 14	def __init__(
 15		self,
 16		log_dir: str | Path,
 17		train_config: dict | None = None,
 18		name: str | None = None,
 19		**kwargs,
 20	) -> None:
 21		train_config_json: str = json.dumps(train_config, indent="\t")
 22
 23		if name is None:
 24			_run_hash: str = hashlib.md5(train_config_json.encode()).hexdigest()
 25			name = f"h{_run_hash[:5]}-{datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%y%m%d_%H%M')}-{rand_syllabic_string()}"
 26
 27		log_dir = (Path(log_dir) / name).as_posix()
 28
 29		# Initialize the TensorBoard SummaryWriter with the specified log directory
 30		self._writer: SummaryWriter = SummaryWriter(log_dir=log_dir, **kwargs)
 31
 32		# Store the run path
 33		self._run_path: Path = Path(log_dir)
 34
 35		# Initialize the global step counter
 36		self._global_step: int = 0
 37
 38		# Log the training configuration
 39		self._self_writer_add_text("config", train_config_json)
 40		self._self_writer_add_text("name", name)
 41		with open(self._run_path / "config.json", "w") as f:
 42			f.write(train_config_json)
 43
 44	def _self_writer_add_text(self, tag: str, message: str, **kwargs) -> None:
 45		self._writer.add_text(
 46			tag,
 47			message + ("" if not kwargs else "\n" + json.dumps(kwargs, indent=4)),
 48			global_step=self._global_step,
 49		)
 50
 51	def debug(self, message: str, **kwargs) -> None:
 52		self._self_writer_add_text("debug", message, **kwargs)
 53
 54	def message(self, message: str, **kwargs) -> None:
 55		self._self_writer_add_text("message", message, **kwargs)
 56
 57		# Also print the message
 58		print(message)
 59
 60	def metrics(self, data: dict[str, Any]) -> None:
 61		# Log a dictionary of metrics using add_scalar in TensorBoard
 62		for key, value in data.items():
 63			self._writer.add_scalar(key, value, global_step=self._global_step)
 64
 65		# Increment the global step counter
 66		self._global_step += 1
 67
 68	def artifact(
 69		self,
 70		path: Path,
 71		type: str,
 72		aliases: list[str] | None = None,
 73		metadata: dict | None = None,
 74	) -> None:
 75		# Log an artifact file using add_artifact in TensorBoard
 76		self._writer.add_text(
 77			tag="artifact",
 78			text_string=json.dumps(
 79				dict(
 80					timestamp=datetime.datetime.now().isoformat(),
 81					path=path.as_posix(),
 82					type=type,
 83					aliases=aliases,
 84					metadata=metadata if metadata else {},
 85				)
 86			),
 87			global_step=self._global_step,
 88		)
 89
 90	@property
 91	def url(self) -> str:
 92		# Return the command to launch TensorBoard with the specified log directory
 93		return f"tensorboard --logdir={self._run_path}"
 94
 95	@property
 96	def run_path(self) -> Path:
 97		# Return the run path
 98		return self._run_path
 99
100	def flush(self) -> None:
101		self._writer.flush()
102
103	def finish(self) -> None:
104		# Flush and close the TensorBoard SummaryWriter
105		self._writer.flush()
106		self._writer.close()
